body: One Day My Prayers Will Be Answered And A Translation On The Second Mangaka Will Be True.

I wish I had an older brother that suddenly grew a twin for some reason and wanted to have sex with me. But if my older brother did undergo mitosis then I'd just have twice the disappointment because I don't have a hot older brother. Instead I got a bitchy sister who steals my stuff and was a constant source of annoyance in my life. Well joke's on her! She can't steal stuff shit when she's in a grave!
They should have done double penetration
